DOC.brief_summary: Prospective evaluation safety efficacy dHACM clinical outcome lumbar laminectomy microdiscectomy patient assess Oswestry Disability Index .
DOC.detailed_description: The objective prospective study evaluate safety efficacy dHACM clinical outcome lumbar laminectomy microdiscectomy patient randomize one two group : 1 ) without dHACM ( control ) 2 ) dHACM .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Are 18 ( eighteen ) year age old time surgery . 2 . Patients single multilevel spinal stenosis undergo open lumbar laminectomy , patient singlelevel herniated nucleus pulposus undergo singlelevel lumbar microdiscectomy 3 . Are willing able return schedule followup visit , follow post operative instruction undergo require radiographic exam 5 time point 4 week 24 month postsurgery ( 6 week ± 2 week , 12 week ± 2 week , 6 month ±1 month , 1 year±2 month , 2 year ±2 month postsurgery ) , include one study MRIscan 12 week ±2 week first 20 patient enrol . 4 . Are willing able sign study specific informed consent . 1 . NonEnglish speaking patient 2 . Nonsurgical candidate define patient deem surgeon surgical candidate participate follow reason : patient meet indication lumbar laminectomy microdiscectomy surgery , patient contraindication surgery medical comorbidities , pregnancy , etc . 3 . Allergic aminoglycoside antibiotic 4 . Is prisoner 5 . Is involved worker 's compensation litigation relative spine injury 6 . Has history drug alcohol abuse within last 12 month 7 . Is currently participate another drug device clinical trial 8 . Previous spinal surgery 9 . History deformity , mechanical instability , spinal fusion requirement 10 . History hard softtissue spinal infection 11 . Has sign symptom disease , autoimmune disease , could result allograft failure , experience allograft failure past 12 . Patients unable undergo MRI
